LanguageData.Miho_Mech_CataphractRocket.label: Gestate Cataphract (Thermobaric Rocket Battery)
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_CataphractRocket.description: A specialized medium range siege tank equipped with a multi rocket battery.
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_CataphractCluRocket.label: Gestate Cataphract (Cluster Rocket Battery)
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_CataphractCluRocket.descriptio: A specialized long range siege tank tank equipped with a cluster rocket battery.
